mapper.select: SELECT login_user_info.office_info_id, office_info.office_name, login_user_info.role, login_user_info.password, login_user_info.email_address, employee_info.employee_name, employee_info.employee_info_id FROM login_user_info INNER JOIN employee_info ON employee_info.login_user_info_id = login_user_info.login_user_info_id INNER JOIN office_info ON login_user_info.office_info_id = office_info.office_info_id WHERE login_user_info.email_address = #{email}
